languages.text: "Твои несокрушимые легионы изничтожили всех, кто дерзнул встать на их пути. Что бы мы ни бросили против тебя, все обращалось в прах, который стопы слуг твоих втаптывали в масло и копоть. Нас осталась лишь горсть. Пощады! Пощады!"

"Your indestructible legions have annihilated all who dared to stand in their way. No matter what we threw at you, it all turned to dust, which your servants then trampled into oil and soot. Our survivors are few. Mercy! We beg for mercy!"
languages.original_text: "Твои несокрушимые легионы изничтожили всех, кто дерзнул встать на их пути. Что бы мы ни бросили против тебя, все обращалось в прах, который стопы слуг твоих втаптывали в масло и копоть. Нас осталась лишь горсть. Пощады! Пощады!"

traits.locale_text: "Your indestructible legions have annihilated all who dared to stand in their way. No matter what we threw at you, it all turned to dust, which your servants then trampled into oil and soot. Our survivors are few. Mercy! We beg for mercy!"

"Your indestructible legions have annihilated all who dared to stand in their way. No matter what we threw at you, it all turned to dust, which your servants then trampled into oil and soot. Our survivors are few. Mercy! We beg for mercy!"

"Your indestructible legions have annihilated all who dared to stand in their way. No matter what we threw at you, it all turned to dust, which your servants then trampled into oil and soot. Our survivors are few. Mercy! We beg for mercy!"

"Your indestructible legions have annihilated all who dared to stand in their way. No matter what we threw at you, it all turned to dust, which your servants then trampled into oil and soot. Our survivors are few. Mercy! We beg for mercy!"

languages.text: « Vos légions indestructibles anéantissent tous ceux qui osent leur faire obstacle. Tous nos efforts pour vous arrêter ont été piétinés par vos serviteurs et réduits à néant. Il ne reste plus qu'une poignée d'entre nous. Pitié ! Nous implorons votre pitié ! »
languages.original_text: "Your indestructible legions have annihilated all who dared to stand in their way. No matter what we threw at you, it all turned to dust, which your servants then trampled into oil and soot. Our survivors are few. Mercy! We beg for mercy!"

traits.locale_text: « Vos légions indestructibles anéantissent tous ceux qui osent leur faire obstacle. Tous nos efforts pour vous arrêter ont été piétinés par vos serviteurs et réduits à néant. Il ne reste plus qu'une poignée d'entre nous. Pitié ! Nous implorons votre pitié ! »

languages.text: "Eure unzerstörbaren Legionen haben jeden ausgelöscht, der es gewagt hat, sich ihnen in den Weg zu stellen. Was wir Euch auch entgegengeworfen haben, es ist zu Staub zerfallen, den Eure Diener sodann zu Öl und Ruß zertrampelt haben. Nur wenige von uns haben überlebt. Gnade! Wir flehen Euch um Gnade an!"
languages.original_text: "Your indestructible legions have annihilated all who dared to stand in their way. No matter what we threw at you, it all turned to dust, which your servants then trampled into oil and soot. Our survivors are few. Mercy! We beg for mercy!"

traits.locale_text: "Eure unzerstörbaren Legionen haben jeden ausgelöscht, der es gewagt hat, sich ihnen in den Weg zu stellen. Was wir Euch auch entgegengeworfen haben, es ist zu Staub zerfallen, den Eure Diener sodann zu Öl und Ruß zertrampelt haben. Nur wenige von uns haben überlebt. Gnade! Wir flehen Euch um Gnade an!"

languages.text: «Tus legiones indestructibles han aniquilado a todos cuantos se interponían en tu camino. Da igual lo que lanzáramos contra ti, solo quedaba polvo que tus sirvientes pisoteaban hasta dejar solo hollín y aceite. Quedamos muy pocos. ¡Piedad! ¡Suplicamos piedad!».
languages.original_text: "Your indestructible legions have annihilated all who dared to stand in their way. No matter what we threw at you, it all turned to dust, which your servants then trampled into oil and soot. Our survivors are few. Mercy! We beg for mercy!"

traits.locale_text: «Tus legiones indestructibles han aniquilado a todos cuantos se interponían en tu camino. Da igual lo que lanzáramos contra ti, solo quedaba polvo que tus sirvientes pisoteaban hasta dejar solo hollín y aceite. Quedamos muy pocos. ¡Piedad! ¡Suplicamos piedad!».

languages.text: 「あなたの無敵の兵団は、邪魔する者達をすべて蹴散らしました。何を投げたとて、それはすべて粉々になり、あなたの従者達がそれを踏みつけて油と煤に変えるのです。こちらの生存者は、ほんのわずか。お慈悲を！どうかお慈悲を！」
languages.original_text: "Your indestructible legions have annihilated all who dared to stand in their way. No matter what we threw at you, it all turned to dust, which your servants then trampled into oil and soot. Our survivors are few. Mercy! We beg for mercy!"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの無敵の兵団は、邪魔する者達をすべて蹴散らしました。何を投げたとて、それはすべて粉々になり、あなたの従者達がそれを踏みつけて油と煤に変えるのです。こちらの生存者は、ほんのわずか。お慈悲を！どうかお慈悲を！」

languages.text: “您所向无敌的军团消灭了所有胆敢阻挡您的人。无论我们打算用什么手段阻止您，都只不过是自取灭亡罢了。我们的一切都被您的仆人碾为飞灰，化为尘土。我们已经不剩多少人了，求您饶命！我们乞求您的宽恕！”
languages.original_text: "Your indestructible legions have annihilated all who dared to stand in their way. No matter what we threw at you, it all turned to dust, which your servants then trampled into oil and soot. Our survivors are few. Mercy! We beg for mercy!"

traits.locale_text: “您所向无敌的军团消灭了所有胆敢阻挡您的人。无论我们打算用什么手段阻止您，都只不过是自取灭亡罢了。我们的一切都被您的仆人碾为飞灰，化为尘土。我们已经不剩多少人了，求您饶命！我们乞求您的宽恕！”

languages.text: "Yıkılmaz lejyonlarınız, yollarına çıkmaya cüret eden herkesi yerle yeksan etti. Karşınıza ne ile çıkarsak çıkalım toz ettiniz. Geriye kalanlar da yağ ve is hâline geldi. Pek azımız hayatta kaldık. Merhamet edin! Yalvarırız, merhamet edin!"
languages.original_text: "Your indestructible legions have annihilated all who dared to stand in their way. No matter what we threw at you, it all turned to dust, which your servants then trampled into oil and soot. Our survivors are few. Mercy! We beg for mercy!"
